s.text: Since higher interest rates take months to restrain economic expansion, postponing a hike is like waiting "to brake a runaway car until it is a few feet from the cliff's edge."
Bill Gates, by contrast, envisions a PC-plus future , where the PC will remain the primary computing tool but will be integrated with other smart devices.

An example of the tragic consequences of Pataki's neglect: A demented man, refused care by several overcrowded health care facilities, recently killed a woman by pushing her under a subway train.
